price: Basi nyinyi mkikufuru, mtawezaje kujikinga na Siku ambayo itawafanya watoto wadogo waote mvi?
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ يَوۡمٗا يَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنَ شِيبًا
footnotes: Basi mkikufuru mtajikinga vipi na adhabu ya Siku ambayo kwa kitisho chake itawafanya vijana wawe vikongwe wasio na nguvu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fakayfa tattaqūna in kafartum yawman yajʿalu al-wil'dāna shīban
